comments.body:
i'm assuming these will come in a separate PR?

i don't know about the others but i'm in favor of having multiple commits per PR.
this reduces my notifications spam and is still easy to review, because one can review single commit at a time.
Yeah, but this PR is already big enough, when you add the TODOs please open an issue.
Also add `newStats.CPU.UsageNanoCores == nil` ? Because it might be nil. And I guess most probably a nil UsageNanoCores causes #46198
No need - there's a "removeUint64Ptr" call that handles this.
